Item.String: Schematics for the Saw blade launcher

Item.Description: A low-power pistol ammo, quite cheap because of its low efficiency
Widely-used handgun ammo, easily obtained in the Wasteland
Pistol rounds "HnH Magnum", used in some revolvers and rifles
"Magnum" rounds - heavier, more expensive and rare than other handgun ammunition
Handgun ammo produced in large quantities long before the War
Common sniper rifle rounds
Great and powerful handgun rounds, very effective, but rare and expensive
Large-caliber bullet with a steel tip - one of the most rare, expensive and effective kinds
Common assault rifle rounds, widely-used by both armies during the War
Small-caliber rounds used in high fire-rate weapons, when quantity means more than quality
Ammunition that contains buckshot instead of bullets, used for shotguns
A modern and more effective shotgun shell
A very large caliber ammo designed for heavy machine guns
Flammable liquid used in flamethrowers
Compact Spark-battery of medium power used in magical energy weaponry
Standard Spark-battery used in most models of magical energy weapons
Energy cell of increased power based on rare crystals. Used as a power supply in the deadliest magical energy weapons
A small explosive projectile for use in grenade launchers
A self-propelled projectile for use in rocket launchers
A magical projectile, resembling an egg. Destructive energy, hidden deep inside, is expressed on a surface merely by elusive flickering of lights
A cylinder of liquid propane and isobutane - highly flammable gases
A common attribute for a darts game
A circular saw of stainless steel with sharp teeth
A plastic bottle with concentrated acid
A heavy iron thing, used to attach sleepers to rails
If the alchemical compounds contained in this small cell react, this would cause an instant drop in their temperature to the almost absolute zero
A battery used for a star blaster, many times more powerful than usual batteries
Bottle caps used as money
The substance used by Auto-Doc as an expendable material for treating injuries and wounds
Suitable for treatment of scratches and cuts and also stops bleeding
Intended for treatment of light injuries. Treatment effect takes some time
Intended for treatment of injuries of medium severity. Treatment effect takes some time
Intended for treatment of severe injuries. Treatment effect takes some time
Restores magical power and heals magical burnout and exhaustion
Restores magical power and heals magical burnout and exhaustion
Restores magical power and heals magical burnout and exhaustion
Clears body of magical radiation
Instantly neutralizes effects of any kind of toxins and increases poison resistance for a short time
Permanently increases maximum health
Permanently increases the maximum of magical power
Portable techno-magical device developed by the Ministry of Arcane Sciences with support from the Ministry of Image, capable to make his owner invisible for a short period of time
Can be used to repair almost any weapon. Using this, you can repair an equipped weapon by some degree depending on the weapon class and your repair skill
Using a portable bench you can repair your weapons and armor on a march, just like using a regular workbench
Contains all the necessary equipment for creating explosives on a march
Contains all the necessary equipment for preparing potions and chemicals in the field
Needed to call or dismiss a tamed phoenix
A small security robot that can also serve as a personal assistant or secretary. Has a fairly powerful laser weapon. Can be used as a companion
This magical item contains recorded memories of other creatures. Using it brings you an additional skill point
Collection of medical supplies necessary to treat light wounds and injuries. Basic medical skills are required to use this item
A set of medical instruments needed for mending fractured bones and other serious injuries. Advanced medical skills are required to use this item

Contains complex medical tools and healing spells for treating the most severe wounds. One can literally bring somepony back to life with this, providing he has the most advanced medical skills and lots of experience
A pack of artificial blood, compatible with blood of any pony race

A substance in capsules of yellow and red colors, temporarily increasing radiation resistance. Recommended when working in places with high magical radiation background. Use one capsule per individual
Drugs in a form of peppermint-flavored candy. Temporarily gives you a boost to intelligence and clear thinking, and also sharpens your senses, but has reverse, negative after effects
Improved version of Mint-als, giving much more prominent effect. Incredibly boosts brain capabilities and sharpness of perception. Effect doesn`t add up with that of common Mint-als
A powerful military stimulator, that gives you a feeling of time being slowed down. Increases speed and gives additional action points in S.A.T.S.
An advanced version of the dash, makes user fast as a lightning. True, there is some probability of sudden death from a heart attack. Does not add up with the effect of an ordinary dash
A drug developed and manufactured during the Great War in order to increase soldiers` courage and aggressiveness. Makes user feel unstoppable rage, resulting in higher amount of damage being caused
A potent pain-killer for intravenous injection. For a short time makes you completely mute to pain, which is sometimes used to increase soldiers` effectiveness in combat

A drug that combines effects of Rage and Med-X. It makes one feel unstoppable rage while simultaneously suppressing any pain and self-protection instinct, making him or her very dangerous and deadly. Not compatible with common Rage or Med-X
Steroid drug in form of green pills, used to increase physical strength and endurance. Starts working immediately, although only for a short period of time

Healing potion of unmatched effectiveness, formulated with essence of an actual hydra. Speeds up living tissue regeneration by up to a hundred times, mending any injuries, but it is also dangerous because of possible mutagenic side effects
Rare and valuable medicine used to treat chemical addiction. Instantly removes all drug effects, both positive and negative, and also neutralizes poison
Instantly restores health. Even though it is capable of saving life in a critical condition, it is very toxic
This potion gives you wings, thus making you able to fly. The effect is temporary

Drinking the potion will turn you into a shadow. While in this form, it is hard to see or cause damage to you, but you won`t be able to fight as well. Also, it seems that it weakens unicorns` telekinesis ability
The potion reduces magical energy consumption for telekinesis and different spells, increasing their power, and also speeds up energy restoration
For a short period of time allows you seeing through walls and also to see things that are hidden or concealed with magic
For five minutes allows you to breathe underwater and swim much faster
This potion somewhat protects you from the harmful effects of the Pink Cloud
If during its action you are dealt a death blow, you gain absolute protection for 5 seconds and partially restore your health. Absolute protection does not save from poison and bleeding
Smokable. The effect is unpredictable!
This potion makes your bones sturdy and capable to endure heavy load. Permanent effect
Drinking this improves your ability to resist different negative factors, such as poisoning, bleeding and radiation. Permanent effect
This potion improves your reflexes and increases aggression. You can deal more damage with melee weapons. Permanent effect
This potion increases running speed and stamina capacity. In other words you can run faster and longer. Permanent effect
This potion fortifies your nervous system and sharpens sight, which improves your shooting accuracy. Permanent effect
This potion gives you an ability to anticipate the near future to some extent, and thus evade enemy bullets. Permanent effect
It is hard to say what exactly this potion does and how it works, but with it your hits will cause critical damage more often. Permanent effect
A potion invented by unicorns in the distant past. Strengthens magician`s connection to natural forces and increases power of his spells
Purifies from curses
The most popular alcohol-free fizzy beverage with carrot flavor. Speeds up restoration of magical energy
Non-alcoholic fizzy drink produced before the War. Restores health
It is extremely not recommended eating this thing. But perhaps there is somepony who might like it
A rare kind of Sparkle-Cola, which contains radioactive substances. Has a radish taste and glows in the dark
Tasty and healthy drink with a light stimulating effect
Fresh brahmin milk, removes radiation
Low-alcoholic beverage made from local oats. The taste is not so great
Low-alcohol beverage from potatoes. The taste leaves much to be desired
Alcoholic drink of medium strength from local fruits, or whatever is now used instead of them. Pretty pleasant to the taste
A fairly strong alcoholic beverage obtained by distillation
An hard draft with a scent of fusel oil. For those who simply want to get wasted
Almost pure alcohol, rare and quite expensive
Cider of the highest quality with a delicate taste and aroma
Rare rose wine for real esthetes
In addition to apples, the composition of this liqueur includes a dozen different kinds of fruits
A popular brand of whiskey before the War, currently 200-year-old!
Vodka of elite quality, worth a lot of money before the War. Purified with magic crystals!
They say that over the passed time this tincture has acquired an absolutely unique taste
"Healing" liqueur made from apples, 24 kinds of herbs and medical alcohol
You can pour in hot water, or just eat it dry
You can cook something with it, or just chew it as it is
Pretty tasty, sweet and nutritious
An incomprehensible gray mass with even more incomprehensible bits of something, perhaps dried vegetables
Food rich in vegetable protein
Relatively fresh bread, baked no more than a week ago
You can eat it as is, but it`s better when cooked
Pre-war potato chips with the taste of spicy horseradish
Crackers with the taste of sorrel, so dry that one could use them to make sparks for a bonfire
A mixture of nuts in a bag, who knows how preserved from pre-war times
Sweet corn flakes shaped like air bombs
Pre-war delicacy, delicious sweet and sour sweets
Delicacy from the land of zebras
Sweet mass made of ground peanuts
Honey can be stored for hundreds of years, but fresh honey is lost, probably, forever
A real apple grown on the surface
Mushroom of questionable edibility
Sweet and crisp root
Bitter vegetable, used in many dishes
Delicious vegetable of a slightly sour taste
Green watery vegetable
Juicy and fibrous vegetable
Fresh butter from a local farm
Fresh cheese, looks and smells good
Looks more like an egg of some reptile than bird
It is not recommended to eat raw meat
Nutritious tubers, usually used in cooked form
The main ingredient of any pastry
A very spicy and odorous vegetable, used as a seasoning and as a chemical weapon
Sugar is no longer produced, so its strategic reserves are very valuable
Tomato sauce with many spices and preservatives
It is said that meat increases aggression
Simple snack
Simple yet delicious dinner
Simple but nutritious and healthy food
It is important not to simply cut and mix vegetables, but to do it in a correct order
Very nourishing and delicious lunch
The traditional food of Wasteland wanderers. Any eggs are suitable for making it
Common humble breakfast
The main principle of this dish is to mix everything in one pan and cook it
While this dish may look simple, its preparation has a lot of nuances
By the Wasteland standards this is a rich dish
A very tasty vegetable casserole with crispy cheese crust
This recipe was invented after the war, when meat began to be consumed in large quantities
Mixing, at the first glance, incompatible ingredients, we get a completely unexpected taste
An old, well known in the past recipe for hoofmade pies
Everypony`s favorite tea time pastries
Nowadays it is not so easy to get the right ingredients for the traditional apple pie. But it`s totally worth it
The filling of this pie consists of meat and vegetables. It is very nutritious, and if you eat it for breakfast, you are sated until evening
This pie includes almost everything sweet that can be found it the Wasteland. Extreme dose of sugar
A cake with a very strange filling, for true lovers of Wasteland culinary
A type of soup of a very complex composition. Only an experienced chef can cook it properly
Pre-War bits, not widely used these days, but can be exchanged for caps
Gems are still valued highly these days. You can sell it for a good price
Gems are still valued highly these days. You can sell it for a good price
Gems are still valued highly these days. You can sell it for a good price
Information downloaded from the terminal contains long forgotten secrets of the past. You can sell it for a good price
Data on pre-war technologies is on high demand among certain communities

Item.String: Disc of the Min. of Image
Item.Description: This disc contains information about the development of the StealthBuck M2. Perhaps Steel Rangers will find it interesting
Undamaged pre-war books - a true rarity nowadays. Most merchants will gladly pay for them
The burglar rune can open any lock, even a stuck one. Single use. To activate, hover cursor over a door or container with a tough lock and press @1
The rune of return teleports you to the base camp from anywhere (confirm action by pressing the button). You can return to the nearest MAS terminal. One-time use
A single use device used to do a deep reboot of the terminal resetting all passwords. It was hard to get even before the War, not to mention now. To use, hover over a secure terminal and press @1
Despite its name, this book can tell you not only about fixing toasters, but actually about repairing anything - from household equipment to modern weapons
In this book you can find interesting and fun facts about medicine, first aid, treating wounds and even basics of surgery
This book has detailed and well-illustrated descriptions of locks of different types and much advice on how to break them. An author definitely must`ve had problems with the law
A children`s guide, in which author introduces young readers to the basics of information technology, and also shares different less known facts about terminals and other electronic systems
A book sponsored by the Ministry of Morale. It contains guidelines for safe handling of explosive materials used in fireworks and some other devices
Monthly illustrated catalog of firearms. It has detailed information on latest technical achievements and fashion trends in this industry
A book on history of melee weapons. From ancient spears and blades to modern magical energy swords
A book about the latest trends on everything concerning development and application of magical energy weapons. Although useful information is quite diluted with pompous speeches and propaganda
A guide for beginner spies and scouts. Despite that the author was obviously a paranoid psycho, the book contains some useful information
This book teaches how to communicate with traders of all sorts, how to barter and get discounts and also recognize some common tricks and ruses
A guide for young unicorns, that is supposed to help them develop their telekinetic strength
This book was written after the War. It tells about different dangers of the Wasteland and ways to deal with them. The author - Ditzy Doo
One of many pre-war books, dedicated to unicorn magic. Far from being very clever and scientifically accurate, it still has colorful pictures and lots of practical advice
Although this book tells about true alicorns, such as the princess Celestia, the knowledge contained in it might help you against the Goddesses alicorns
Contains many records of ghoul studies
A piece of paper found on Butch, the head of the slavers` guards
Belonged to Sharp Shooter, the leader of a slavers gang
A note found on one of the griffins in the prison camp
Just a souvenir
The magazine, issued before the War by a society that promoted the idea of ​​turning ponies into cyborgs. It lasted only one year, after which it was banned for moral and ethical reasons
A pack of drawings for some unusual armor. Only specialists can understand them
A huge sapphire spreading a frosty aura
A huge ruby ​​shining with fiery light and radiating heat
A huge emerald, for some reason always wet and smelling like the sea
The device for precise measurements of size
Can cut even a thick iron bar
A complex device for analyzing parameters of an electrical signal
A whole box of brand-new bolts and screws of all sizes. A dream of any mechanic
A whole box of brand-new nuts and washers of all sizes. A dream of any mechanic
A book telling about movements of celestial bodies
A plastic canister containing a clear viscous liquid. With the necessary knowledge you can turn it into explosive nitroglycerin

This disk contains schematics, wiring diagrams and other information useful for figuring out how equidroids work. Although, frankly, it`s unlikely for one to be able to understand at least some of this without being a certified robotics engineer
A box of cigars illegally imported from the zebra country. Excellent smokes
Excellent pipe of cherry wood. Smoky Pit will be glad to get it
A device for heavy smokers. Perhaps Smoky Pit will like it?
Leaf tobacco for smoking pipes. Perfectly preserved, Smoky Pit will gladly pay for it
The only known cure for this disease
A magical device that cleans water of chemical impurities, microbes and radiation
A compact device that uses Balefire technology to produce an almost unlimited amount of energy
The document is titled "ኽዤዌቇሕችነዥሚኆ፧" - whatever this means. Unfortunately, you don`t speak the zebra language and won`t be able to read this
A powerful talisman, which will serve only an experienced warrior. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
A powerful talisman possessing powers that only a true hero can handle. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
A great talisman, giving its power only to the chosen ones. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
A legendary talisman worthy of only the best of the best. Increases damage from any weapon by #1
Screwdriver is required for lock picking. You will also require pins. If you lack them, you can try to open the lock anyway, but the probability for the lock to get jammed will be much higher

Pins are useful for lock picking. They are used to probe and move springs inside a lock with less risk of breaking and jamming it than if using brutal force. In case of failure, you might break the pin, but you will be able to try again using another one

A premium screwdriver made from the sturdiest titanium alloy should help unscrew even the most rusty bolts. You will also find it useful for opening locks, and your lockpicking skill will increase by #1
A medical device designed to hear sounds coming from internal organs... or the sounds the lock makes during lockpicking. Increases your level of lockpicking by #1
A very useful tool for sharpening weapons. Just always carry it with you and it will increase damage of your piercing and cutting weapons by #1
Old binoculars with scratched lenses, a gift from Calamity
Helps enter the Steel Rangers bunker. One-time use
Allows changing the game difficulty to "very easy" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "easy" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "normal" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "hard" for a single time
Allows changing the game difficulty to "super-hard" for a single time
Opens various locks in the slavers` den
Gives access to the ManeTec Department of Special Research
Gives access to the overmare office of stable 88
The key taken from a very strong alicorn in Manehattan, the Blood Moon
The key belonging to the necromancer zebra Mchawi
The key that was kept by Elder Coldsight
Oak Stalwort`s key
The key to some cellar in Canterlot that, according to rumors, is full of treasures. At least you hope so, and that the key is worth it
A key found at the Legion`s headquarters
Key received from the commander of the Enclave base
A secret technology developed as a part of "Cyber-pony" project. Implant reinforces skin with polymer tissue, that raises damage threshold by #1. Implantation cost is included in retail price

A complex and expensive implant that combines advanced magic and nanotechnology. Automatically restores the user`s health by #1 units per second, without requiring additional resources, but no more than #2 of the maximum health
The implant created specifically for war mages. Never lets your magical power reach zero, protects from burnout

A small chip that connects directly to the brain. Improves memory, helps to do mathematical calculations, improves the accuracy of telekinesis. In general, this leads to an increase of Lockpicking skill by #1 and Science by #2
A simple device, connectable to PipBuck. Set for detection of small metal items, it allows you finding lost caps and ammo in the most unexpected places
An advanced module for PipBuck, allows scanning enemies to define strong and weak points. In S.A.T.S. you will see exact information about your enemies` health and armor

A complex device, connectable to PipBuck. During battle defines enemies` weak points not covered by armor and marks them with a laser point. You have a chance to attack in the weak spot, completely ignoring any armor. The chance is higher when using rifles and pistols

A complex techno-magical module for PipBuck, employing illusion magic. Acts as an active camouflage system, making it harder detecting you. In battle it creates illusive noise, distracting enemy`s aim. Increases Stealth and evasion bonus by #1

An addition to medical PipBuck module. It constantly monitors your health, automatically applying medical spells in mortal danger, allowing the owner to survive and keep conscience even when seriously wounded. However it takes a long time to recharge after each use
A complex module for PipBuck allowing you to partially automate the picking of a password. Increases your skill for hacking terminals by #1
Improved laser for a robo-owl, increasing damage by about one third
Strengthened body for the robo-owl, increasing its survivability
Just an empty case without any filling
A small but very powerful processor. Currently connected to your PipBuck, which increases your level of lockpicking and terminal hacking by #1, as well as the number of APs in S.A.T.S. mode by #2
An extension module for PipBuck increasing its computing power. Increases your level of lockpicking and hacking by #1, as well as the amount of AP in S.A.T.S. by #2
Be Smart! Increases damage from combat spells by #1, also increases the chance of successful lockpicking and terminal hacking
Awareness! It was under "E"! Increases accuracy and stealth by #1
Be Strong! Increases damage from melee weapons by #1, damage from hoof attacks by #2, and health by #3
Be Awesome! Increases damage of all firearms by #1, and the speed of running and swimming by #2
Be Pleasant! Reduces the prices of merchants by #1 and increases the effectiveness of healing potions by #2
Be Unwavering! Increases the damage threshold by #1, reduces consumption of stamina and magical power by #2

An ancient and mysterious relic, increasing the magical power of the owner but enslaving his mind. Under no circumstances should you wear this amulet around your neck! Although just laying in your bag, it still strengthens your battle spells by #1 and decreases magic consumption by #2

The ancient tome written by mighty zebra shamans and containing their forbidden knowledge. But it is not just the dark spells and terrible rituals described in the book that are of interest. The book itself is also an extraordinarily powerful artifact, protecting its owner from black magic and giving the ability to absorb the vital energy from enemies

This spell enables you to summon a magical barrier in a specific location, absorbing enemy bullets and magical spells. The barrier has limited endurance and time of existence, after which it dissipates. Importantly, it lets your bullets and missiles come through

This spell surrounds you with a protective field, increasing your armor stats. It protects from any external damage, however strong blows, armor-piercing bullets and explosions can overwhelm the shield and cause a somewhat reduced damage. It has limited endurance and existence time
This spell releases all your telekinetic power in one mighty impulse. All enemies around you get knocked back with enormous force and might even get stunned. It is very useful when you are surrounded
This spell uses your telekinetic powers to give you a powerful directed impulse. Can be used for evading attacks in combat or getting to hard-to-reach places
This spell surrounds you with a magic field that slows movements of any hostile objects. Improving "Magic" skill increases a radius of the field
This spell creates a shell around you that looks like a crystal. It absorbs any external damage, consuming magical energy instead of health. To use it, hold down the spell key
The spell summons a spirit moonblade, fighting on your side

Allows you to create a ghost wall impassable for your enemies. The wall has a certain limit of durability and lifetime. It is fully permeable for all inanimate objects, like bullets and shells, and for its creator. The wall cannot be created in doorways and on staircases

The spell uses some of your blood to create an impenetrable magic shield for a few seconds. It gives complete invulnerability to any external damage and can save you at the most critical moment at the cost of some blood loss. It won`t work if you don`t have enough blood
Durable material made of several layers of thick fabric with interlayers of polymer fiber for better ballistic protection. Used for manufacturing light body armor
A material enriched with metallic fiber, able to reflect radiation
A rubber-saturated material, impenetrable for liquid and gaseous substances. Protects well in the aggressive environment
Firm pieces of chemically hardened leather, can be used to enhance and repair leather armor
Hard and shiny metal plate, that not just any bullet can break through. Can be used to repair and enhance metal armor
A plate made of ceramics and complex polymers. Very firm and light, it is used in a modern combat armor
A plate of indistinct material, greatly enhanced by magic. Used in a magic armor
A fragment of a thick and sturdy chitinous shell. With enough skill you can make a decent armor
A plate of composite materials with a special textured surface. Used to repair or improve scout armor
A fragment of one of the greatest achievements of equestrian science and technology. Perhaps, if you collect enough of these parts, you can build a complete set of armor
Aramid is stronger than steel and five times lighter. A multilayer fabric of this material can stop a pistol bullet and is quite fireproof
Still looks like new
A bit rusty, but quite sturdy and sharp
Even after all those years it is still elastic
Essential in any household
Indispensable accessory of any smoker
An empty bottle of Sparkle-cola, or of some other beverage
A container for canned food
Just a pile of metal parts, good for nothing
A small detonator used in grenades
Ordinary gunpowder
A small sensory module, reacts on proximity of specified objects
An ordinary lunchbox from "Stable-Tec"
A kitchen timer shaped as a half of an apple
A mechanism for spraying paint
A substance in shape of yellow crystals, a base for powerful explosives
An elastic part of some device
Electric motor from a broken circular saw
Can glue anything to any surface of any material for good
Organic solvent, obtained from the resin of coniferous trees. Toxic and flammable
Different details that can be used for repair or assembly of new weapons
A Spark-battery used for powering up machinery and equipment. Heavy and not very powerful, yet very long-lasting
A simple device for air compression
A hermetically sealed pan for cooking at high temperature
A device, measuring pressure, equipped with a safety valve
A very powerful one, can hold stuff 200 fold heavier than itself
A compact magical device, allowing holding small items in air
A large and very pure crystal, used in heavy magical energy machinery for focusing energy flows
It has zero electrical resistance
An element of high capacitance, capable of producing high discharge
A memory module containing 300,000 most used passwords. It can be used to create a device that would help hacking terminals
Old desktop fan, long broken and non-functional
Old desk lamp, long broken and non-functional
Old coffee maker, long broken and non-functional
All sorts of transistors, resistors, diodes, microschemes and other parts
Electronic chip, that can be reprogrammed using necessary equipment and skill
A compact device for generating radio signals of certain frequency and amplitude
Device for scanning surroundings using ultrasonic signals
A low-power laser, that can be used in an automatic target designator
Crystal of complex internal structure, refracting and modifying light
A complex magical device, capable of supporting patient`s life even when he is one hoof in the grave. Can restart a stopped heart
Block controlling movement of a robot
Full of very dangerous poison
Can be obtained from acidic slime
A muddy brownish liquid, that substitutes ghouls blood
Glows in the dark with ominous poisonous-green light
Wing membrane of a huge bloodwing
A fang of a bloodwing, containing liquid, preventing blood from coagulating
Resembles an ordinary insect wing, but of enormous size
Faceted eye, sparkling with all colors of the rainbow
Eww gross!
Looks like a giant worm
In a desperate case can be a substitute for machine oil
Some ponies consider this smelly substance good for health
Gives some creatures the ability to breathe fire. You can feel a powerful magic contained inside
All sorts of plants having magical properties, necessary for most potions. It is hard to find them in the Wasteland, although some zebra earn their living by gathering these for sale
A multipurpose remedy for every life situation, used in hundreds recipes
Crystallized magical essence
Slime which absorbed the concentrated Pink cloud
Ephemeral substance left after destruction of a necrosprites swarm
A horn of a very strong Canterlot ghoul

A substance of magical nature. On contact with a living material it causes horrible mutations, but in precisely selected doses and in combination with other reagents may cause advantageous alterations
An incredibly potent magical reagent. When properly used, it helps to wake up hidden potential of the body
Pretty versicolored liquid with a horrible taste. Has prominent magical properties
Sparkling silvery dust, that might be found in places of meteorite landing
A rare opaque mineral of blue-white color. According to beliefs, it has a connection to ancient mystical forces
Actually, nopony knows what it is exactly, but not a single really powerful potion is possible without it
An orange crystal resembling a tongue of flame. And even warm to the touch
Very rare alchemical reagent
It appears to be materialized dark magic
A particularly long and sharp claw once belonging to a large hellhound. You can use it to make a weapon or sell it for a good price
A pouch made of thick tarpaulin of a special design by Brass Buckshot. With this you can carry more ammo, batteries or explosives without any loss of mobility
A durable synthetic fabric pouch designed by Steel Rangers specialists. With this you can carry more ammo, batteries or explosives without constraining your movements
An incredibly rare elixir, the recipe of which seems to be lost forever. Enhances the magical talent making unicorns capable of holding more spells in memory at the same time. The effect is permanent
A blue crystal of irregular shape. Its purpose is unknown
Makes horsgregation using magnetic resonance - you don`t have to be a scientist to understand that
Much more powerful than common quadruponificator. A real breakthrough in a world of quadruponification!
Neighralyzes whatever you want and any way you like - this device has so much better capabilities compared to its analogues
It can glow in different colors or rectify electric current - depending on the state of the quantum field
The most important thing to remember when working with this device - where that plug goes into. Incorrect plugging may cause dire consequences
Power armor for pegasi. You will not be able to wear it properly without some modifications

Dear Reader! If you hold this opus in your hooves, that means that you have decided to take the first step in mastering the subtle art of foul language. The ability to swear firmly and ornately is actually an important and essential part of intelligent speech, and there is absolutely nothing shameful in it if used properly. In most cases, simply adding a dirty word to your speech is not enough to impress audience and fully express your feelings, and many improve their skills of conveying emotions colorfully throughout entire life. Sadly, our dictionary will unlikely be enough to raise you to the level of real maestros of this art, because the truly masterful swearing should come intuitively and from your very heart. But thanks to this book, you can definitely get a starting point that will guide you in further improving your talents in this field
Turns you into a small animal for a short time. This potion is so powerful that it`s enough to take just the smallest sip, hence you can use it many times
